comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: September 28, 1912 "Lawn Fete for Oscar Straus" Bull Moose Candidate for Governor of New York in 1912. [Kicking off the Bull Moose (Progressive Party) campaign in Nassau County.] Held at the Long Island home of Bourke Cockran, Bull Moose candidate for Congress. Story in The New York Times, September 29, 1912: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9F04EFD9113AE6... Other Bain/LOC photos of the Lawn Fete for Oscar Straus: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2515739507/in/photostream/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2515739229/in/photostream/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2516555780/in/photostream/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2516557368/in/photostream/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2515733737/in/photostream/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2515733049/in/photostream/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2516556066/in/photostream/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2516556764/in/photostream/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2516556980/in/photostream/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2515732783/in/photostream/]

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: LOC: Cockran's name is misspelled in your title and in Bain's.
